document_data.name: Raumkreml
document_data.mainbody: The '''Raumkreml''' (also spelled as "Raumkremyl"), also called '''Chern-kreml''' or the '''Black Citadel''', was a tower located in the city of [[Almorel]] within the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Location: The Raumkreml was located in the center of Almorel.
document_data.Structure: This tower was built as a fortress during the height of the [[Raumathar]] Empire. The entire ziggurat was built of wood that had been painted black on the outside, spawning the nickname of the Black Tower.
document_data.Inhabitants: Almorel used the Raumkreml as their seat of government.
